name: instNonUnitalSubringClassTwoSidedIdeal
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : NonUnitalNonAssocRing R
⊢ NonUnitalSubringClass (TwoSidedIdeal R) R
decl:
instance {R} [NonUnitalNonAssocRing R] : NonUnitalSubringClass (TwoSidedIdeal R) R where
